data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Samarkand words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Samarkand, Uzbekistan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 930 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.section_summary: On average, 98 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Samarkand, Uzbekistan.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, the believers in the state of Samarkand, Uzbekistan need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 519,300 souls living in the state of Samarkand with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Tatar people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Tatar people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Tatar people is yours.
Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Samarkand.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 507,219, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.section_summary:
the state of Samarkand, Uzbekistan has a population of 519,300.

We estimate Samarkand has 930 people who might know Jesus, 11,151 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 507,219 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 558 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Samarkand, Uzbekistan.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.
